data.text: Ku olwo Debola ne Baraki mutabani wa Abinoamu ne bayimba bwe bati:
“Mutendereze Mukama
“Muwulirize mmwe bakabaka, musseeyo omwoyo mmwe abalangira;
“Mukama, bwe wava e Seyiri,
Ensozi ne zikankana awali Mukama, Oyo owa Sinaayi,
“Ku mulembe gwa Samugali, mutabani wa Anasi,
Abakulembeze mu Isirayiri baggwaawo
Bwe beefunira abakulembeze5:8 abakulembeze, kyokka era Abayisirayiri baali bavudde ku Katonda omulamu nga bagoberera bakatonda abalala abalala,
Omutima gwange guli eri abakulembeze b’Abayisirayiri,
“Mukyogereko mmwe,
Wulira oluyimba lw’abantu ku luzzi,
Zuukuka, zuukuka Debola
“Awo abakungu abaasigalawo
Awo abaava mu kitundu kya Efulayimu ne baserengeta mu kiwonvu,
Abalangira ba Isakaali baali wamu ne Debola;
Kiki ekyakusigaza mu bisibo byo eby’endiga,
Ab’ekika kya Gireyaadi baasigala mitala wa Yoludaani.
Ab’ekika kya Zebbulooni baawaayo obulamu bwabwe,
“Ku mugga gw’e Megiddo mu Taanaki,
Emunyeenye zaalwana nga zisinziira mu ggulu,
Omugga Kisoni gwabasanyizaawo ddala,
Awo embalaasi ne zijja nga zirigita

Malayika wa Mukama n’agamba nti, ‘Mukolimire Merozi5:23 Merozi kyali kibuga mu Nafutaali; abantu baamu tebeetabanga mu kulwana ntalo newaakubadde okuwamba abalabe abawanguddwa, abalabe abo ne bwe baabanga badduka.
“Nga wa mukisa Yayeeri okusinga abakazi bonna!
Bwe yasaba amazzi, yamuwa mata,
Yakwata enkondo ya weema mu mukono gwe ogwa kkono,
Amaanyi gaamuggwa n’agwa;
“Nnyina wa Sisera yalingiriza mu ddirisa;
Abazaana be abagezi baba tebanamuddamu
‘Tebazudde omunyago era tebali mu kugugabana,
“Ayi Mukama Katonda abalabe bo bazikirirenga bwe batyo nga Sisera.
